availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Snodgrass Douglass in Harrison County, Kentucky, on April 20, 1826. Father of Lucy Douglass, Mary J. Douglass, Catherine Douglass, Elizabeth Douglass, Milton Douglass, America Douglass, John Douglass, and Nancy Douglass. Married to Rebecca F. Rowe Douglass in Harrison County on May 5, 1850. Father of Joel F. Douglass and James N. Douglass. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.
